title: Event
description: An event which occured during the processing of the referenced consignment.

descriptionMap.de: Eine Ereignis (Status), das während der Abarbeitung einer Sendung aufgetreten ist.

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the shipping partner
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the shipping partner

descriptionMap.de: Eindeutige Bezeichnung für die Sendung im Transport-Management-Systen des Versandpartners

consignmentNoReceivingPartner.title: Consignment number of the receiving partner
consignmentNoReceivingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the receiving partner

descriptionMap.de: Eindeutige Bezeichnung für die Sendung im Transport-Management-Systen des Empfangspartners

shippingDate.title: Shipping date
shippingDate.description: The date on which the consignment was forwarded to the receiving partner. If the consignment was part of a cargo manifest, this is the date on which the manifest was issued

descriptionMap.de: Datum, an dem die Sendung an den Empfangspartner geschickt wurde. Bei Sendungen, die Teil eines Borderos sind, ist dies das Bordero-Datum

sender.title: Data Origin
sender.description: The sender of the current record. This usually equals to the ordering party unless the record is a copy that was generated by some other component. In this case the sender can be different from the ordering party

descriptionMap.de: Der Versender des Datensatzes. Dies ist in der Regel der Versandpartner bzw. der beauftragende Partner. Er kann jedoch abweichen, wenn ein Dritter eine Kopie erzeugt und weiterleitet.

receiver.title: Data Recipient
receiver.description: The intended recipient of the the current record. This usually equals to the contracted party unless the record is intentionally sent to another system.

descriptionMap.de: Der Empfänger des Datensatzes. Dies ist in der Regel der Empfangspartner bzw. der beauftragte Partner. Er kann jedoch abweichen, wenn der Datensatz gezielt an ein anderes System übertragen werden soll.

networkId.title: Network
networkId.description: The network under which rules the consignment should be processed

descriptionMap.de: Das Netzwerk, unter dessen Regeln die Sendung abgewickelt werden soll.

networkId.title: Name of the network
networkId.description: The name of the network. This is often identical to the name of the code list. Since the same code list may however be used outside the network, this field independently allows to specify the network.

descriptionMap.de: Der Name des Netzwerk. Dieser ist in der Regel identisch mit der Code-Liste. Da die Code-Liste des Netzwerks jedoch auch für bilaterale Vereinbarungen genutzt werden kann, kann das Netzwerk als solches unabhängig angegeben werden

codelist.title: Name of the code list used
codelist.description: The name of the code list which specifies how the receiving system should interpret the codes used

descriptionMap.de: Der Name der verwendeten Code-Liste, die angibt, wie ein empfangendes System die Werte zu interpretieren hat

product.title: Name of the product
product.description: The product allows to distingish different processes within one network, effectively sub classing the network.

descriptionMap.de: Das Produkt erlaubt verschiedene Prozesse innerhalb eines Netzwerks weiter zu unterscheiden und ermöglicht somit eine Unterteilung des Netzwerks in verschiedene Bereiche.

orderingParty.title: Ordering party
orderingParty.description: Person or company that ordered the transport of the consignment. Often identical to the shipper

descriptionMap.de: Person oder Firma, die den Versand der Ware beauftragt hat. Oft identisch mit dem Versender

shippingPartner.title: Shipping partner
shippingPartner.description: The partner which is sending the consignment to the receiving partner for further delivery.

descriptionMap.de: Der Partner, der die Sendung an den Empfangspartner für die weitere Zustellung sendet.

receivingPartner.title: Receiving partner
receivingPartner.description: The partner which is receiving the goods declared on the manifest from the shipping partner for further delivery.

descriptionMap.de: Der Partner, der die auf dem Bordero aufgelisteten Sendungen für die weitere Zustellung empfängt.

reportingPartner.title: Receiving partner
reportingPartner.description: The partner which is receiving the goods declared on the manifest from the shipping partner for further delivery.

descriptionMap.de: Der Partner, der die auf dem Bordero aufgelisteten Sendungen für die weitere Zustellung empfängt.

dataProcessing.title: Data processing
dataProcessing.description: Events occured while validating and processing the data.

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die durch die Überprüfung und Verarbeitung der Daten entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while processing the data. Use (null) to report successful processing of the data

invalidData.title: Wrong data
invalidData.description: The data is incomplete, missing or wrong

invalidPackageType.title: Wrong package type
invalidPackageType.description: Wrong, incomplete or missing package type information

invalidDangerousGoodInformation.title: Invalid Dangerous good information
invalidDangerousGoodInformation.description: Wrong, incomplete or missing information about the dangerous goods

generalProcessingNotification.title: General processing
generalProcessingNotification.description: Events occured while physically processing the consignment (e.g. moving goods, scanning packages).

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die während der physischen Beförderung der Sendung entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while processing the consignment. Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

incompatible.title: Incompatible
incompatible.description: The shipment is not within the agreed specifications (e.g. to heavy / big / ...)

incomplete.title: Incomplete
incomplete.description: There are some packages missing from this consignment

untilmatelyLost.title: Ultimately lost
untilmatelyLost.description: Consignment is utimately lost and will no longer be searched for

unloading.title: Unloading
unloading.description: Events occured while unloading the consignment.

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die während der Entladung entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while processing the consignment. Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

lateArrival.title: Late arrival
lateArrival.description: The consigment arrived too late for normal processing

missing.title: Missing
missing.description: The consignment did not arrive or parts of the consignment are missing

damaged.title: Damaged
damaged.description: The consignment was damaged on arrival

deliveryPlanning.title: Delivery planning
deliveryPlanning.description: Events occured while planning the delivery of the consignment

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die während der Zustelldisposition entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while planning the delivery of the consignment. Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

outsideDeliveryArea.title: Outside delivery area
outsideDeliveryArea.description: The address of the consignee is not within the area served

plannedForSecondTour.title: Planned for second tour
plannedForSecondTour.description: The consignment will be picked up and deliverd later on the day

notInDelivery.title: Not in delivery
notInDelivery.description: The consignment will not be delivered today

timeSlotFromConsignee.title: Time slot from consignee
timeSlotFromConsignee.description: The consignee has provided a time slot for delivery

newDeliveryDate.title: New delivery date / time
newDeliveryDate.description: The new date / time when the delivery will be performed

badWeatherConditions.title: Bad weather conditions
badWeatherConditions.description: The weather does not permit delivery.

deliveryStarted.title: Delivery started
deliveryStarted.description: Events indicating the start of the delivery

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die bei der Verladung für die Zustellung entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while planning the delivery of the consignment. Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

noCapacity.title: No capacity available
noCapacity.description: There is no suficient capcity available to perfom delivery at the moment

deliveryAttemptFailed.title: Delivery attempt failed
deliveryAttemptFailed.description: Events indicating a failed delivery attempt

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die einen gescheiterten Zustellversuch anzeigen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that caused the delivery to be fail

abortedDueToLongWaitingTime.title: Aborted due to long waiting time
abortedDueToLongWaitingTime.description: The delivery attempt was aborted due to too long waiting time at the consignee

rejected.title: Rejected
rejected.description: The consignee has rejected the consignment

damaged.title: Damaged
damaged.description: The delivery was rejected because the consignment is damaged

incomplete.title: Incomplete
incomplete.description: The delivery was rejected because some parts of the consignment are missing

tooLate.title: Too late
tooLate.description: The delivery rejected because it was performed after the deadline

missingDocumentation.title: Missing documentation
missingDocumentation.description: The delivery was rejected because required documentation (e.g. delivery note) was missing

notOrdered.title: Not ordered
notOrdered.description: The delivery was rejected because the consignee never ordered the goods

difficulties.title: Difficulties
difficulties.description: There were difficulties delivering the goods

returnConsignmentNo.title: Return consigment no
returnConsignmentNo.description: Number of the consignment which is used to return the goods to the shipper

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die bei einer erfolgreichen Zustellung entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while planning the delivery of the consignment. Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

incomplete.title: Incomplete
incomplete.description: Some parts were missing and thus not delivered

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die bei einer erfolgreichen Zustellung entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

changeRequest.title: Change request
changeRequest.description: Events indicating new information that should be added/updated in the consignment

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die neue Informationen enthalten, auf Basis derer die Sendung aktualisert werden sollte.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

billingDeliveryTerm.title: Billing - Delivery term
billingDeliveryTerm.description: A new delivery term that should be considered for billing

billingAreaPalletBays.title: Billing - Area (in pallet bays)
billingAreaPalletBays.description: The area occupied by the consignment - expressed in standard pallet sizes

billingLoadingMeter.title: Billing - Loading meter
billingLoadingMeter.description: The area occupied by the consignment - expressed in loading meters

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.description: Events indicating the cancellation of the consignment

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die die Stornierung der Sendung betreffen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured
